original: Andersson, Anders Johan, ingenjör, Linköping, f. 21/8/99 i S. Akarp, Malmöh. 1., av G. E. A. o. Mathilda Mattsson. G. m. Birgit Ekström. Barn: Boel f. 35, Jan 37, Kerstin 41, Malin 44. — Stud:ex., maskiningiex. v. Techn. i Strelitz. Aff :res. t. Norge, Engl., Frankr., Belg., Tjeckoslov., Ungern, Rumänien, Bulg. o. Jugoslav. 32-39. Div. kort. anst. t. 28, statiker v. Messerschmitt Flugzeugbau i Augs-burg 28-30, statiker o. sen. ritkont:-chef v. Sv. Aero A-B i Lidingö 31-32, ritkont xhef v. A-B Sv. Järnv iverkst. aeroplravd. i Linköp. 33, chefskonstr. v. Bücker Flugzeugbau GmbH i Rangsdorf bei Berhn 33-39, chef f. konstr.-kont. v. Sv. Aeroplan A-B i Linköp. sed. 39.
translated: Andersson, Anders Johan, engineer, Linköping, b. 21/8/99 in S. Akarp, Malmöh. 1., son of G. E. A. and Mathilda Mattsson. Married to Birgit Ekström. Children: Boel b. 35, Jan b. 37, Kerstin b. 41, Malin b. 44. – Studied at Techn. in Strelitz, graduated with a degree in mechanical engineering. Worked in various countries, including Norway, England, France, Belgium, Czechoslovakia, Hungary, Romania, Bulgaria, and Yugoslavia from 32-39. Had various short-term employments until 1928, became a statistician at Messerschmitt Flugzeugbau in Augsburg from 1928-1930, statistician and later chief of the drawing department at Sw. Aero A-B in Lidingö from 1931-1932, drawing chief at A-B Sw. Järnv iverkst. aeroplravd. in Linköp from 1933, chief designer at Bücker Flugzeugbau GmbH in Rangsdorf near Berlin from 1933-1939, and chief of the design department at Sv. Aeroplan A-B in Linköp from 1939 onwards.
